City Council

  1. City Charter / Code of Ordinances
  2. City Council District Map

The City Council is a seven-member policy board for the City of San Angelo.

The Council meets twice a month at the McNease Convention Center, 500 Rio Concho Drive. Meetings are open to the public and are usually held on the first and third Tuesday of every month at 8:30 am

  1. Tom Thompson

    Mayor
    Email Tom Thompson
    Phone: 325-315-1380

    Term expires: May 2029

    Council Member, District 1

City Council Strategic Priorities

Anyone who requires an auxiliary aid or service for effective communication, or a modification of policies or procedures to participate in a program, service or activity of the City of San Angelo, should email Angela Bloss , call 325-650-1814 or fill out this online form as soon as possible but no later than 48 hours before the scheduled event
